description: When the reckless or negligent actions of others leave people with serious injuries, the Swartz Fogy Law Group in Fair Oaks, California, provides focused personal injury representation. We have seen the physical, emotional and financial repercussions that accident injuries may have on people and their families, and our law firm is committed to helping clients recover the maximum compensation for their losses...
